description: Brothers Oli and Jay Hall have both been favourite models for a while and we had lots of requests to get them together in the same shoot. It only took a little persuasion, and the resulting photo shoot is really fun. They quickly start messing around together and compare their physiques. They strip off their t-shirts and pose, flexing their muscles. Before long they are down to their boxers; they clearly have hard-ons so off come the boxers, and they use their solid cocks as flag poles! Apart from the odd sneaky looks at each other, there's very little shyness between the brothers. They even hold both legs in the air to show off their bums! After the posing they both sit back on the sofa, and both wank off in front of each other - Jay comes first, then Oli. Good work, boys!
title: Bonus Video of Oli and Jay's Photo Shoot - Str8 Brothers Wank in Front of Each Other!
